executable.title: Stochastic Tractography Filter
executable.description: Generates a VTK XML polydata file that contains a collection of sampled fiber tracts. Each fiber tract is a sample from the fiber tract posterior probability distribution.

parameters.label: Stochastic Tractography Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the Stochastic Tractography algorithm

integer.name: labelnumber
integer.description: Label Number to use as seed points
integer.label: Seed Point(s) Label Number

double.name: stepsize
double.description: The length of each segment of the tract in mm
double.label: Step Size(mm)

double.name: gamma
double.description: A prior parameter controlling the smoothness of the tracts. Larger values reduce probability of sharp turns
double.label: Gamma

boolean.name: recenteroriginswitch
boolean.label: Recenter Image Origins
boolean.description: Ignore the origins of the ROI and WM mask and set it to be the same as the DWI image origin

integer.name: totalthreads
integer.description: Total number of threads to use. Default value of zero sets number of threads to number of CPUs
integer.label: Total Threads

boolean.name: continuoustractsswitch
boolean.description: Output tracts in continuous instead of discretized IJK space.
boolean.label: continuoustractsswitch

image.name: dwifilename
image.label: Input Volume
image.description: Input DWI volume to be filtered

image.name: wmpfilename
image.label: Input White Matter Probability Volume
image.description: Input Mask volume that provides the probability that the voxel is white matter

image.name: roifilename
image.label: Input ROI Volume
image.description: Input ROI volume used to seed algorithm

file.name: tractsfilename
file.label: Output Tracts
file.description: Output tracts as VTK XML Polydata file (.vtp extension)
